snippet.title: Spellweaver Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Spellweaver will be available on Steam from 1st of February, 2016! Here is the official Steam trailer of the game!

Become a Spellweaver and join the battle for Asperia - http://spellweaver-tcg.com/

Spellweaver is a digital card game, created by a self-funded indie team of seasoned game developers with a passion for card games. Spellweaver is free to play – no purchases are necessary to win or fully enjoy the experience.

Follow us @
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/SpellweaverTCG
Twitter - https://twitter.com/SpellweaverTCG
